title: Lakshmi Kasula Haaram with Polki Pendant and Pearl-Ruby Tassel
materials: Faceted Rubies. Features our signature Hyderabadi Gold Polish for a lasting sheen.

Delicately placed rubies accentuate the Polki work, adding a touch of vibrancy. The necklace strand alternates between lustrous seed pearls and vibrant rubies. A striking pearl and ruby tassel adds a contemporary flair to this traditional piece. The secure clasp is subtly integrated for seamless wear.
occasions: and grand cultural celebrations. A statement piece suitable for both traditional South Indian attire and elegant modern ensembles.
